title: Yasuo Patchnotes 6.18

replies.body:
> "By contrast, Fighters (like Vi or Darius) can take a moderate beating as they dish out their own damage, "

how do you quote this and still think Riot said they do no damage?

And you are using 1 wrong to justify another wrong/ Just because Yasuo was in a bad spot before doesn't mean it's ok for him to be in the spot he is now. You have literally on decent argument. But hey, you have a lot of salt

Nowhere did riot say that fighters do not do significant damage. Maybe check your reading comprehension before writing walls of nonsense?

Darius is, incidentally, very easy to kite, unless you try to faceroll him and then turn and run at 25% hp.

Can you read? Nowhere in the patch notes does it say they do no damage. It says "they can take a moderate beating while dishing out their own damage" and then says "but lack the agility of a slayer." It you're going to argue Darius with a phage and DMP is as mobile as Yasuo we might as well stop talking now because you're clearly not capable of advanced cognitive function. Riot is saying Tankiness + mobility + damage is not fair. Darius = Tankiness + Damage - Mobility. Yasuo = Tankiness + Damage + Mobility. See the difference?

You also clearly have no idea about the internal classes of this game. There are numerous sub-categories to describe each major category. For example fighters have the sub-classes juggernauts, slayers and divers, Mages have sub-classes such as burst mages or battle mages, Tanks have vanguards and wardens etc. The patch notes might be a little poorly worded on this one, so I guess it's understandable.

Your second rant about "fairness" is asinine. By your logic because Yasuo had times where he sucked he deserves to be broken for the rest of eternity? Ok, better revert those Gangplank nerfs because he sucked for like 2 seasons before his rework, therefore he needs at least 2 seasons of being busted. If you're going to whine, at least be constructive about it, don't just ramble because you're salty your main got nerfed.

"darius alone does more damage then all these slayers " EXACTLY LOL also its funny how they mentioned yasuo and fiora's defensive ability mean while fiora's riposte blocks LITERALLY ever single thing in the game then there's yasuo's windwall doesnt block most of the elements that force you to build tank, like a full a armor moakai running at you or a malphite ulting you or any of those stupid tanks that do more damage then damage dealers but build tanky so they are pretty much freelo lmafo

Fiora's riposte doesn't block the base laser.

In all seriousness all this nerf means is you need to have critical strike in your build again. Just adapt the build. {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3022}} a heavy armor item, a solid MR item, and boots to fit your build appropriately. You keep the stickiness, increase the damage, lose a little tankiness in group scenarios, but gain tankiness in 1v1 scenarios.
doesnt block base laser hahah good one yeh dude people will always find ways to make stuff work ill be experimenting alot with random shit
The only thing I dislike is that it means the build path will probably be more expensive as far as the build I'm thinking of is concerned as you're literally adding another core item.
